text: Descombes is a French language surname that may refer to: *Colette Descombes, French film actress *Émile Descombes (1829–1912), French pianist *Jeanie Descombes (born 1935), American baseball player *Vincent Descombes (born 1943), French philosopher *Vincent Descombes Sevoie (born 1984), French ski jumper Category:Surnames Category:French-language surnames
title: Descombes
